top_comments.comment: Fun lesson!  Seems to be some typos in the tab - roots and third page. (Still has you playing 5th). Sorry to be that guy. Just hope you can fix it for future people.

Great video … once I finish the fretboard accelerator course i will look to enroll next year … the fretboard accelerator is a great course that is really teaching me the fretboard as well as the triads … “ visualize and verbalize “ 🙂 and hope u don’t wind up in bass jail 🥴 hahaha. SBL rocks.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Remember when Scott was less of a shill? Man those were the days. Still love the dude though 🤘🤘
